msg.msgText: The client failed to establish a secure connection to Message Gateway because the security socket factory class {0} does not implement the javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory interface.

msgExplanation.p: A custom security socket factory must implement the javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory interface.

msgUserResponse.p: Specify a security socket factory class that implements the javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory interface.
